dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.CustomerBillingCycle
dataStructure.description:
An occurrence of a billing cycle. Besides significant dates, it records who triggered the cycle.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerBillingCycle

child.name: billingDate
child.description:
A billing date.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: billingDate

child.name: chargeDate
child.description:
A date through which charges previously received by the billing system appear on the bill.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: chargeDate

child.name: creditDate
child.description:
A date through which credits previously received by the billing system appear on the bill.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: creditDate

child.name: mailingDate
child.description:
A customer bill mailing date.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: mailingDate

child.name: paymentDueDate
child.description:
A customer bill payment due date.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: paymentDueDate

child.name: productionReason
child.description:
The reason for this cycle run. Values may be SCHEDULE_RUN, PROVEIDER_REQUEST or others

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: productionReason

child.name: customerBillingCycleSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association BillingCycleSpecDescribes

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillingCycleSpecification

child.name: customerBill
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustomerBillCreationTriggeredBy

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBill

child.name: customerBillSpec
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..*

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CycleTriggersCreationOfBillDescribedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillSpec
